Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment:
We don’t follow this convention in i3. Also, please just make this:

    const bool exists = (stat(path, &st) == 0);

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: This still says file-exists, but the directive is called path_exists by now. I am not entirely happy with Path-exists, but I think it’s the most consistent choice.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: To clarify, I was talking about the manpage section being called Path-exists

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: I suggest using a different title, just for clarity. E.g. make the above one VPNC instead of VPN.
